name: Parque de Estacionamento
title: (2300) Parque de Estacionamento
description: Paid parking from 8 to 20:00, 3.8 euros for 4 hours maximum. At the foot of the Convent of Christ, with a view of the city. There is also another paid parking lot just below Dr Guimaraes' Avenida. In February, very few vehicles. Preferential access by Av Guimaraes for more than 3.5 T

title: (2300) Tomar - 81 Avenida Doutor Cândido Madureira
description: New laundry downtown, across the street from the tourist office.

title: (2300) Tomar - 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa
title_short: (2300) Tomar - 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa
description:
Small car park below the convent
ideal in April, surely more complicated in high season free from 8 p.m. to 8 a.m.

address.street: 50 Rua Doutor José Maria de Sousa

title: () Tomar - Rua Coronel Luíz António Aparício
title_short: () Tomar - Rua Coronel Luíz António Aparício
description: Parking near town.

title: (2300) Tomar - 14 Travessa João Freire Gameiro
description: Park it's allowed overnight, it's forbidden park at Friday because it's local market

title: (2300) Tomar - 1 Rua Santa Iria
description: Large municipal parking, be careful not parked on Thursdays and Fridays because there is the market, a sign tells you the times, otherwise parking place well for visits and quiet overall, it is better to park on the part at bottom of the car park yes there are the wooden barriers as there is room for cantilever and shade and about 25 seats

title: (2300) Tomar - Rua Aquiles da Mota Lima
title_short: (2300) Tomar - Rua Aquiles da Mota Lima
description: 2016.12.14 - Small parking on cobblestones facing the citadel / monastery on the edge of a quite noisy street and not far from the city center. This place completes the 2 nearby car parks already listed on Park4nigth. Here no maintenance service or wifi access. Nevertheless and close to the Bombeiros the bar Capitulo allows you to access the wifi with the code "superbock" (without parentheses!)

title: (2300-153) Tomar - 8 Rua Amorim Rosa
description: Self service laundry, laundromat

title: () Tomar - Rua Horta do Barão
description: Was once a community campsite, is now a free pitch. Laundry is possible on site on washboards. Ideally located for visiting the castle and the city. Public toilets at the sports center. Public toilets 100 m away at the stadium/playground. There are a few cats running around here who also live here, which may be the deciding factor for one or the other dog owner.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Nice little spot, isolated under the pines, next to the aqueduct. calm.

title: (2300) Tomar - 67 Rua de Coimbra
description: Very large laundry. 6 washing machines 8.12 and 20kms. 6 dryer. Coin mechanism and product included. On the avenue leading to the lidl. Pasteleria chorasqueira nearby. 20 minutes from the area in the modern district. A few meters higher a second laundry.

title: (2305-203) Tomar - Vale dos Pegões
description: Parcheggio

title: (2300) Tomar - 6 Rua Choromela
description: Lidl parking lot, open between 8.30-22 o'clock.  Very quiet and undisturbed at night.

title: (2300) Tomar - R. da Quinta das Gorduchas
title_short: (2300) Tomar - R. da Quinta das Gorduchas
description: Intermarche sells the blue Campingaz bottles

name: Quinta da Choupana
title: (2300-404) Quinta da Choupana
description:
Educational farm of 2.7 hectares, quiet and peaceful place. 4 km from the Templar city of Tomar, 30 km from the Sanctuary of Fátima, 1h30 from Lisbon and 2 hours from Porto. Near the dam of Castelo de Bode, Penedo Furado em Villa de Rei, dam of the Caril ...
Price for 2 adults and 2 children up to 13 years old. €5 extra per person.
Use of the swimming pool: €2/day/person.
THANKS

title: (2300) - Estrada Ribeira
description: Chaotic path, much too steep, very difficult to access and a lot of large mosquitoes on site. We did not stay. I do not recommend at all.

title: (2300) Tomar -
description: Beautiful little beach on Lake Carril, a stone's throw from Tomar! If you are looking for a place in nature for the night in order to visit Tomar the next day as I was, this is a great solution! Only downsides: the motorway which is really not far but little frequented at night, and the access which is a little steep on a dirt road should be avoided in rainy weather.

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

name: Camping Pelinos
title: () Camping Pelinos
description: Camping Pelinos - Very quiet site, generous locations, high hedges to separate the sites, swimming pool, very nice owners, nature environment. Sanitary flawless, nothing to complain about. service at the top.

title: (2350) - Estrada das Moreiras
description: Unpaved road in the eucalyptus and pine forest. Good for one night, fom campers only up to 6m.

title: () - CM1088

with some trees and trash bins.

the parking areas near the bath are very crowded in the season. 
(only 2G with NOS)

title: (2350) - 1 Rua dos Moinhos

description: Parking very close to the water or for real off-roaders you can park by the water . very nice and calm. few People were enjoying the place on a weekend.

Small gravel car park with magnificent view of the lake. Some cars parked during the day. Quiet night, access to swimming. Single electricity plug inside a little warehouse free to use.
very nice view, access to the river, in the next beach there is a swimming pool.

Free, quiet, quiet and safe. No services. Good for overnight stay during the fair of Golegã, although crowded. 5 minutes walk from the city center.

title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
description: Fatima Parking available for visits. It is true that the number of "camper" places is limited, but apart from "important events and busy days" it is tolerated to park in the "car" parking lot, obviously taking care not to get in the way. In May 2019 the barriers were therefore open and nothing to pay, we stayed one night. Thanks to Fatima for her welcome. SPECIFIC: There are 14 or 15 parking spaces around the site where there is really space, we were in parking lot number 6

address.street: 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo

I wouldn't recommend it during summer months as its right next to the local lake beach and many cars park in this tight spot. would be ok overnight though. easy access to dornes town by bike 5min or by cannoe / sup 2min /walking 20min

description: Quiet location by night, 300m away from EN2 road crossing and 150m from petrol station, with parking places not very flat to sleep. There are picnic tables, trash cans, water and a playground. About 500m away from lower area (several old fountains) of historic center of Sardoal village.

title: (2200-024) Alferrarede - 1B Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Intermarche services. free black and grey drains. tokens from the petrol station for electric hook u and drinking water. intermarche, bricomarche and car wash and garage next door. Clean services easy access. close to historic monument.

title: (2200-241) Abrantes - 3 Rua do Girassol
description: Free parking near the city center except market day.

title: (2200-420) Abrantes - 37 Rua do Pisco
description: Shop where gas bottles can be exchanged. Also the Campinggaz bottles. Not an LPG station. It is also difficult to get there with a camper / car. I went by bicycle. Have been looking for a shop to exchange camping gas bottles for a long time. You can do that here!!

title: (3250) Alvaiázere - Rua Doutor Filipe Antunes dos Santos
title_short: (3250) Alvaiázere - Rua Doutor Filipe Antunes dos Santos
description: Motorhome and caravan park municipal. Easy access to the town and local walks. 7e for motorhome, 3.80 per person. Clean facilities.

address.street: Rua Doutor Filipe Antunes dos Santos

title: () Abrantes -
description: Park dedicated to motorhomes next to Historic Center

title: (2495) - 15 Rua das Grutas da Moeda
description: Ample free parking in the Grutas da Moeda. There is a snack bar and restrooms. It is not allowed to stay overnight. Services: water, discharge and disposal of toilet.

title: (2200-201) Abrantes - Esplanada 1 de Maio
description: Super large motorhome parking with a bird's eye view of the Tagus, just behind the courtyard, ideal for a quiet night. Free parking without amenities, which is also used by passenger cars. Amusement center next door, lots of shopping and parties every night.

title: (2200-365) Abrantes - 26 Rua 17 de Agosto de 1808
description: Very central flat parking with an incredible view towards south. very calm. fantastic night 200m away from the main brand new museum of Abrantes, very worthy to visit. obligatory to eat at the Santa Isabel restaurant and buy the wonderful sweets at the Palha de Abrantes coffee shop.

title: (2395-104) Minde - 425 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Gas station with washer and dryer

title: (3250) - N110
description: Picnic area with shades and tables and water

title: (2395-104) Minde - 308 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Very close to Intermarché

title: (6110 183) Vila de Rei - 3 Avenida Sá Carneiro
title_short: (6110 183) Vila de Rei - 3 Avenida Sá Carneiro
description: Free service area

title: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto
title_short: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto
description: Place with sloping parking, both day/night, above town and next to the football stadium.  Services available - electricity, water and drainage and parking to go to the nearby caves.

title: (3260) - CM1146
description: Place with picnic tables just beside and with acess to a beautiful river beach. On summer and on weekends there’s locals visiting during weekdays it’s very calm and peaceful. It’s in the middle of the country and in the end of a mountain so will have a lot of curves on the road but nothing difficult.

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
description: Quiet, peaceful Aire with full services. Overnight is welcome. Many thanks to the small community. The coffee, breakfast and freshly baked hot breads at "Padrio Heleno" were wonderful. The only place to eat in this small village is "Marmita Do Ze Grande-Fatima" which is an "eat all you want buffet"  (good selection of home-cooked foods at an amazing price). Excellent.

title: () - 4
description: Mountain bike center with shower and toilet, very clean parking lot

title: (2200) Abrantes - 708 Avenida da Portagem
description:
With a great view to the Ríver Tejo. no facilities. 
This is an authorised location. Overnight stay Up to 48 hrs

title: () Abrantes - Esplanada das Docas
description: Parking at the Rio Tejo directly at a busy restaurant and pub, which is open on weekends until 3 am.  There are several waste containers nearby.  Directly opposite on the other side of the river is an event venue where events such as fairs and concerts are held.  There is also the possibility to fill up with water, as well as to dispose of grey water and the toilet.

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 16 Rua do Carvalho
description: Along the Tejo with tables and barbecue.

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
description: Maria Sabão - Lavandaria Self-Service Neat neat self-service laundry. 3 washing machines of which 2x 11kg and 1x 18kg and 2 large dryers.

name: ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
title_short: (2205) ParqueTejo - Turismo, Ciência e Lazer (Parque de Campismo e Caravanismo)
description: Nice camping park with a view over the  Tagus (Tejo) River and Abrantes town hill. Very nice  prices and facilities. All services are free (lot of combined electricity/fresh water plots). Restaurants and grocery stores within walking distance.

title: (2200) Abrantes - E806
description: Service station with picnic area, dump station and water. Cartridges or pipe systems,  not a drive on  dumping grate

title: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
title_short: (2205) Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - 5 Travessa do Cavaco
description: Public toilets in front of the river.

title_short: (2205-033) Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo - Av. Marginal do Tejo
description: Parking - Overnight up to 24 hours

address.city: Abrantes - Rossio ao Sul do Tejo

title: (2200) Abrantes - Estrada do Gaio
description: Station service in abrantes, has free water, black water disposal and WC cleaning. Little supermarket inside and coffe shop. Outside has picnic tables.

title: (2140) Chamusca - 4 N118
description: Free full service served by intermarche. the service is located in the supermarket car park.

title: (6100) Palhais - N238
description: Natural water point and sitting area

title: (2495) Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing little picnic parc called “Parque de Merendas da "Fonte de Peixe" - Vale Maior”. We spent 2 nights in the middle of nature, yet with 2 water fountains (one with a thread for hose). A local guy came by and even opened the toilets for us, we are not sure if they are normally open. very quiet nights alone, just nature sounds. there are rubbish containers and when you drive here, there is an asphaltic road (from direction casal dos ferreiros). we came from a different road, but it was very doable with our van, still we recomment coming from the direction mentioned.

title: (2230) Sardoal - Unnamed Road
description: The name of the spot is LAPA Nice and quite place (except warm weekends). With barbecue and tables. To the village is 2km the only problem is that during the night it is dark and if you need help no one will help you. I don't recommend to sleep there. (2017) This year the fire devastated some of his beauty. In the winter is more beautiful that in the summer, but in the summer you can swim and refresh. Has been remodeled this summer (2017).

title: (6110) Vila de Rei - Unnamed Road
description: Centro Geodésico de Portugal, Vila de Rei, ponto mais central de Portugal. Geodesic Center of Portugal, Vila de Rei, most central point of Portugal.

title: (6100) Palhais - 534
description: Real fresh spring water. Delicious.

title: (6110) Melriça - N2
description: Nice place with lots of trees. It's located on N2 route. Has a nice fontain and some tables. Public toilets too.

title: (2140) Chamusca - Avenida Dr. João Isidro dos Reis
title_short: (2140) Chamusca - Avenida Dr. João Isidro dos Reis
description: Very nice, clean and quiet place.

title: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
title_short: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
description: Very nice place for 2 vans or 1 large camper. It is on the edge of a dirt road. Quiet night and beautiful morning with birdsong and a view of the "Ventas do Diabo". Please keep this site as clean as we did!

name: Parque de Campismo Foz de Alge
title: () Parque de Campismo Foz de Alge
title_short: () Parque de Campismo Foz de Alge
description: Camping park with swimming pool,restaurant and located next to the river.Is also possible to rent canoe and other sports!Enjoy the nature.

title: (3260) Figueiró Dos Vinhos -
description: Nice place

title: (2485) Alvados -
description:
A big parking lot next to the Santo-Antonio cave. 
We spendt one night here. 
Litle traffic on the road, quiet and peaceful.

title: (3260) Sambado - Unnamed Road
description: Very nice spot, quiet despite the campsite opposite. At the water's edge, there is room for 2 van. Access in the village of Sambado, follow a sign "RIO". Dirt road.

title: (6100) Cernache do Bonjardim - 24 Rua dos Peregrinos
title_short: (6100) Cernache do Bonjardim - 24 Rua dos Peregrinos
description: Waterpoint, high pressure! Taste: not so good, like most taps.

title: (3260) Figueiró dos Vinhos - CM1142
description: Park next to Alge's mouth, has tables and chairs, barbecue and water to do the dishes. Camping is not allowed

title: (7480) Avis - Unnamed Road
description: Handy stopover on the main N2. It is just off the main road by the bridge over the rib. Isna down a steepish track. Nice spot by the water. There may be more places here but I didn’t have time to explore.

title: (3250) Leiria - 516 N110
description: Water fountain next to the main street. Space for one vehicle on the small forecourt. Good water flow, very large tube, therefore more suitable for canisters and/or watering cans. Large trash can next to it.

title: (2440-208) - Rua do Malhadouro
description: Small quiet spot, clearing along the path (very infrequent) place for 2/3 cc or more or less flat vans 50m from the climbing walls. No service

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
description: Super point of view at the exit of Fatima, behind a restaurant but not private, easy to maneuver (kind of roundabout) surely cool for a meal and a night

title: (6100) Sertã -
description: Beautiful spot with great views of both sunset and sunrise

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal -
description: Stabilized parking with view for 2 motorhomes. Wind turbines nearby.

title: (2480-034) Alvados - Unnamed Road
description:
Park place next to the Alvados grotto. It is not specific for van but you can park for a quit night and no one will say anything. In the morning you can visit the grotto. 
you have a nice view to the mountains.

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
title_short: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
description: Similar to the spot just up the road but with full mobile coverage (3 bars of 4g). Space for 2 vans. 10 minute walk from the climbing. Nice views. Quiet, peaceful.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Ample space to park for the night for multiple RVs/vans. Quiet spot with no homes in sight and an amazing lookout over the valley below. The only building nearby is the ticket office for the Alvado caves.

title: (2150-034) Azinhaga - 3 Rua da Misericórdia
description:
Parque da igreja matriz da Azinhaga.
Picnic area with grill, sink, water tap and electricity. Has picnic tables by a small river where you can see some birds. Very quiet.

name: Quinta Do Bella Vista
title: (6100-317) Quinta Do Bella Vista
description:
A beautiful quinta set in 2,5 ha grassland.
BBQ and pizza oven available.
10 min walk into small town where all services and amenities are available.
2 min walk into adjacent forest.
Delicious spring water available from the borehole on the land.
Make contact with owners before arrival.

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
description: If the other sites, on the way to the climb, are taken, there is the cemetery car park, quiet, fairly flat. Please leave the site clean for locals and hedgehogs.

title: (2000) - A1
description: Free park dedicated to Motorhomes or vancampers, low noise because of location far from A1.

name: Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
title: (6110) Parque de Campismo do Bostelim
description: Rural campsite (Summer time) but external flat parking open all year round. Inside camping, electricity, hot water shower, wc, grills, lots of shadows, river beach. Access to electricity and water.

title: (2150-020) Azinhaga - 50 Rua Catarina Eufémia
description: Quiet parking lot on the outskirts of the village, next to a cemetery. The parking lot belongs to the adjacent residential building but is obviously not used much. The people here are very friendly and helpful. The night was very quiet, I felt safe.

title: (2480-032) Alvados - 407 Rua Val do Bispo
description: A small place in the village with toilet and shower (cold) and drinking water. Too tight for large CC, only for smaller vehicles

title: (2420) Arrabal - 12 Rua do Pinhoeiro
description: Quinta do Pinhoeiro, 10 minutes from Fátima, 25 minutes from the beaches and 5 minutes from the city center of Leiria.

title: (2420-093) Caranguejeira - 78 Rua das Industrias
description: Excellent place with drinking water from a source that has existed for many years

title: (2380) Malhou - CM1442
description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

title: (2380) - CM1442
description: WC, picnic tables, view of the river, beautiful place!

name: Quinta da Cavada
title: (2420-138) Quinta da Cavada
description:
Quinta da Cavada.
Somos uma família autocaravanista, amantes da natureza e dos animais, somos vegetarianos e gostamos de tudo o que é biológico e temos uma pequena horta.  Moramos numa aldeia, chamada Souto de Cima que fica nos arredores de Leiria, Portugal, onde temos a nossa casa e um pequeno santuário animal, com cabras, ovelhas, galinhas, patos, etc... também temos cães, Golden Retriever e Pastor Alemão e um gato.
Numa parte do nosso terreno, melhorámos para acolher autocaravanas, temos 4 lugares, onde podem estar á vontade, tem água potável, despejos e chuveiro de água fria. O terreno é todo vedado.
Pagamento livre, para manutenção e melhoramentos do espaço. 
Todos são bem vindos, inclusive animais, só pedimos para respeitarem o espaço, as pessoas e os animais que cá estão.
Temos a 650m minimercado, café e pastelaria.
Na Vila da Caranguejeira que fica a 2.4 kms temos restaurantes, Multibanco, Bancos, lavandaria, talhos, farmácia, cafés, mini mercados, etc...
Para visitar aqui perto temos o Cruzeiro e o Miradouro do Carril que se podem visitar numa pequena rota panoramica com vista para a Vila da Caranguejeira, temos o Vale do Lapedo, O Parque Natural da Barroca da Gafaria, etc...
Estamos a 9.7 kms do centro de Leiria, a 18 kms de Fátima, a 32 kms das praias, a 22 kms do Mosteiro da Batalha, etc...Quinta da Cavada. We are a motorhome family, nature and animal lovers, we are vegetarians and we like everything organic and we have a small vegetable garden. We live in a village called Souto de Cima which is on the outskirts of Leiria, Portugal, where we have our home and a small animal sanctuary, with goats, sheep, chickens, ducks, etc ... we also have dogs, Golden Retriever and German Shepherd it's a cat. In a part of our land, we improved to accommodate motorhomes, we have 4 places, where they can be at ease, have drinking water, dumps and cold shower. The land is all fenced. Free payment, for maintenance and space improvements. Everyone is welcome, including animals, we only ask to respect the space, the people and the animals that are here. We have a 650m mini-market, coffee and pastry. In Vila da Caranguejeira which is 2.4 km away we have restaurants, ATMs, banks, laundry, butchers, pharmacy, cafes, mini markets, etc ... To visit nearby we have the Cruzeiro and the Miradouro do Carril that can be visited on a small panoramic route overlooking the village of Caranguejeira, we have the Vale do Lapedo, the Natural Park of Barroca da Gafaria, etc ... We are 9.7 kms from the center of Leiria, 18 kms from Fátima, 32 kms from the beaches, 22 kms from Batalha Monastery, etc ...

title: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
title_short: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
description: Outdoor nature place with picnic area. We spent a very quiet day among the pines. Road nearby . A nice little place for a break.

address.street: 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Picnic park located next to the municipal road to Alvados. Equipped with WC and BBQ area. Everything very clean and taken care of. The bathrooms have electricity with a socket. There is also a small lagoon that is very low, perhaps due to the time of year. Close to hiking trails.

name: Camping Portugo
title: (6100) Camping Portugo
description: Quinta Portugo is located right in the middle of Portugal (geographical center). ***The site is suitable for mini campers and camping buses up to 6.00 m.**** It is not far from our site to the Atlantic (approx. 60 minutes), to Spain (approx. 90 minutes), to the Serra da Estrela, Tomar, Coimbra, Lisbon and Porto. Our site is in a very quiet location, a small supermarket is within walking distance (700 m), otherwise there is a lot of nature here. Things to do in the immediate vicinity are e.g. B. a waterfall, a dam, a natural rock cave, hikes on the Rio Zezere and much more, please contact us. We have two small washhouses with hot water and a seasonal pool with a small snack bar. Electricity is available and free WiFi. We charge EUR 12.50 for one night. FOR A RESERVATION PLEASE CALL BEFORE OR SIGN BY WHATSAPP!!!

title: (6100-211) Cernache do Bonjardim - 17 Rua José Joaquim Ribeiro dos Santos
title_short: (6100-211) Cernache do Bonjardim - 17 Rua José Joaquim Ribeiro dos Santos
description: Parking area set back from the road and from the town center and adjoining a green space ... calm, perfect end-of-day rest in a region where step solutions were lacking

address.street: 17 Rua José Joaquim Ribeiro dos Santos

title: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
title_short: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
description: Very nice water point with tap on the side of the road. good flow

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Unnamed Road
description: Moinho da Cabeça da Vaca it's a magical place with a chilling sunset. It has picnic tables and it is a typical mill in the region where flour was once milled to make bread.

title: (6100) Marmeleiro - Unnamed Road
description: Nice and quiet place! It's a fluvial beach unfinished! Can swim, have grills too, my dog likes it too!!

title: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
description: Free parking area above the town with 6 individually laid out bays. Each bay is fully serviced with electricity, water and drainage (electricity and water not working on our visit probably because the aire has only recently opened, November 2019).Lovely area, very quiet.

title: (2000) Pernes -
description: Parking next to a school. A little movement to be next to a national road.

title: (6100) Castelo Branco District - 2259 N237
description: Picnic stop outside the village and on a quiet road

name: Bonjardim Boutique Hotel
title: (6100-459) Bonjardim Boutique Hotel
description:
Welcome to Bonjardim Boutique Hotel, Restaurant & Wines, an award-winning organic wine estate, slowfood restaurant and boutique hotel. The country manor dates back to 1756 and it is located in the tranquil green heart of Portugal. Wake up to vineyard views, indulge in wine tastings, explore our top-rated rooftop restaurant (rated 9+ / 10 on TheFork.com), or just take a relaxing walk in our private forest. Whether you’re a wine lover, digital nomad or foodie, we’ll make you forget the busy city life and help you explore the unspoiled center of Portugal.

Stay per night (includes water & electricity): €15 (if more than 2 persons, it is €3 per extra person)
Breakfast: €10 (reservation needed the day before)

Free amenities:
Indoor & Outdoor Swimming Pool
WiFi (password: bonjardim)
Parking for your motorbike
Top quality drinking water from our own well

Activities & services:
Wine cellar tour: €5 per person Wine tasting: €10 per person
Organic wine shop: You can buy Bonjardim natural wines in the restaurant. 
Wine course on request (min. 4 people): 1.5 hours (€25 per person). The themes are: Organic wine production; technical tasting; wine regions of Portugal; spirits. 
Restaurant with rooftop terrace: slowfood fusion menu with estate-grown and local produce. No reservations please, just walk in! For opening times, search “Bonjardim Sky Lounge Restaurant” or scan QR code:
Sauna: €7,50, Turkish bath: €7,50, Jacuzzi: €5
Massage: €40 / 0.5 hours , Yoga lessons: price on request
Picknick: €35, for 2 persons
Laundry: €5, pay at checkout.    Detergent is at the reception. Drying machine in winter is €2.50
Wastewater (black & grey): You can empty your wastewater at the dump station, located at the water tap at the Glamping’s solar panel. There are two covers where you can unload.
Waste: You can dispose of your waste in the bins in the small garage by the first gate (look for the tall palm trees).
Dog: €3 for the stay. Keep them leashed so our sheep don’t get chased. Pls remove any dog poop
Bathroom: find the outdoor bathroom down the stairs near the Glamping tents. The indoor shower and toilet are under the restaurant and 
Drinks: in the restaurant. Wines, beer, sodas, juice, sangria, cocktail, coffees, tea
Bread: You can get a bread bag if you want to order bread. On its label you write the number of bread buns you want (white or whole grain). Hang the bread bag in the evening, under the bell, at the main gate (tall palm trees). The baker comes at night; there’ll be bread in it tomorrow morning! (except Sundays). You can pay for it when you check out (€0.50/piece).
Checkout and payments are done at the restaurant reception, open from 10h00. If you want to check out earlier, please do the checkout on the evening before. 
Supermarket: Minimercado Salvador (1 km), supermarket Minipreço (2.5 km)

We hope you enjoy our little paradise we’ve been building since 1989.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 210 Estrada Principal
description: Rest area, located on a mixed parking lot, with greenery, several picnic tables and even a barbecue. 2 km from Porto de Mòs. Facing a small country road, quite quiet. Possibility to spend the day or even the night there. No service. At the start of a beautiful hike (10 km).

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 226 N243
description: Location at the edge of the road ideal for two camper because if no cars on top beautiful view, however noisy in the morning with cars that roll at high speed but repairs very well for one night.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
description: Park next to Santa Casa da Misericórdia. Quieter than ASA, because ASA is next to the road. Parking and overnight stay allowed, except on fair days.

title: (2440) Batalha - 32 Estrada do Casal Novo
description: Temporary parking area on a serviced open lane for future construction and sale of land. Slightly sloping terrain with hard parking spaces away from the city and close to some villas. the land overlooks the city at the top of the hill near a relay antenna. no service but enough for a good night's visit to the monastery the next day. no vehicle at night, only passage of a neighbor who was walking his dog. the lampposts that equip the area do not work unlike those of the nearby road.

title: (2410) Cortes - 169 N356-2
description:
Self service laundry.
Has changing machine.
Has coffee machine and 2 sofas for waiting.
Please disinfect (alcohol provided in site) your hands and bring mask.

title: (2420) Boa Vista - 42 Rua da Moinhaga
description: Picnic area with playground, BBQ and washing-up facilities on the edge of the village. We spent the night on a weekday and it was very quiet, would not attempt coming here at the weekend as it will be busy with locals and probably no parking available. Small gravel parking area behind the toilet building, enough room for two vans. Toilets were closed when we visited but perhaps would be open usually. The water is only accessible by foot.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
description:
Free public toilets and showers including changing table. Very clean. Open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Bad parking. It is best to use the parking lot on the opposite side of the park.
Not open on WEEKENDS!
